2.0.0:
-Migrate configuration files from the idea directory to the src / main / resources directory. The main consideration is that the .idea folder is generally ignored. The reason for this is to avoid additional conflicts when different developers collaborate. -Uploading without specifying a class name or method name, alternately upload the main class in the current file, reducing operating and learning costs. When the class included in the generic is the base class, the generic variable is directly used as the base type. -Map the types in Java and the types of Yapi to ensure consistency, and automatically generate decomposed data. Add support for enumerated attributes and enumerate multiple attributes -fixbug
